nodes.text: The Pyolli system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories' Seswenna sector. The system was the origin point of the dessert known as Pyollian cake.

The Pyolli system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square M-18. On the Jedi Council Forums of TheForce.net, Fry noted that Pyolli was the last addition to the Appendix of the Atlas, a section listing over 4,300 star systems.
